Class GameAlgo

java.lang.Object
gameClient.GameAlgo
public class GameAlgo
extends java.lang.Object
This class contains the algorithms of the game, like next node and more.

    • nextNode

      public static int nextNode​(CL_Agent agent, directed_weighted_graph g, int src)
      This method return the next node for the given agent the next node will be the next node in the closest path to the closest pokemon of this agent
      Parameters:
      g - -the graph
      src - -the node source
      agent - -the agent that need to move to the next node
      Returns:
      the next node

    • closestPok

      public static java.lang.Object[] closestPok​(java.util.List<CL_Pokemon> pokLIST, CL_Agent agent, int src)
      This method return an array with the closest pokemon to the given agent and this pokemon edge
      Parameters:
      pokLIST - - list represents all the pokemons in this level
      agent - - the agent that should move to the next node
      src - - the current node of this agent
      Returns:
      Object array with closest pok and the edge
